tool_description: Designs cable harnesses and wiring configurations for satellite subsystem interconnections based on interface requirements.

source_subsystem_id.description: Registry ID of the source subsystem

target_subsystem_id.description: Registry ID of the target subsystem

cable_type.description: Cable type: power, data, coaxial, fiber_optic, control

signal_requirements.description: Signal requirements: voltage_level, current_rating, data_rate, frequency_range

routing_constraints.description: Routing constraints: EMC_shielding, thermal_protection, mechanical_protection, bend_radius

harness_length_limit_m.description: Maximum allowable harness length in meters

error_messages: Subsystem not found: One or both subsystem IDs do not exist in registry
Invalid cable type: Must be one of [power, data, coaxial, fiber_optic, control]
Empty signal requirements: Must specify at least one signal requirement
Invalid signal requirements: Must contain valid requirement types
Invalid routing constraints: Must contain valid constraint types
Invalid harness length: Length limit must be greater than 0
Incompatible interfaces: Subsystems do not have compatible interface types
usage: Design cable harnesses by specifying source and target subsystems with cable requirements. Ensure subsystems have compatible interfaces.

harness_design_id.description: Unique identifier for the harness design

cable_specifications.description: Detailed cable specifications and part numbers

estimated_length_m.description: Estimated total harness length in meters
